text: The Copa del Generalísimo 1961 Final was the 59th final of the King's Cup. The final was played at Santiago Bernabéu Stadium in Madrid, on 2 July 1961, being won by Club Atlético de Madrid, who beat Real Madrid 3–2. ==Details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|Atletico Madrid: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1 || Edgardo Madinabeytia |- |DF ||2|| Feliciano Rivilla |- |DF ||3|| Jorge Griffa |- |DF ||4|| Isacio Calleja |- |MF ||5|| Ramiro |- |MF ||6|| Alberto Callejo |- |FW ||7|| Miguel Jones |- |FW ||8|| Adelardo Rodríguez |- |FW ||9|| Jorge Alberto Mendonça |- |FW ||10|| Joaquín Peiró |- |FW ||11|| Enrique Collar (c) |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| José Villalonga |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"|Real Madrid: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| José Vicente Train |- |DF ||2|| Marquitos |- |DF ||3|| José Emilio Santamaría |- |DF ||4|| Pedro Casado |- |MF ||5|| José María Vidal |- |MF ||6|| Pachín |- |FW ||7|| Enrique Mateos |- |FW ||8|| Luis del Sol |- |FW ||9|| Alfredo Di Stéfano |- |FW ||10|| Ferenc Puskás |- |FW ||11|| Francisco Gento (c) |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Miguel Muñoz |- |} |} ==See also== *Madrid derby ==References== 1961 Copa Category:Real Madrid CF matches Category:Atlético Madrid matches Category:Madrid Derby matches
title: 1961 Copa del Generalísimo Final
